overview: Had the Conny but only a brown bear desired! Your pony just does not fit in the Schaffhausen bus. »Conny ihr Pony« (2008) by Robert Pohle and Martin Hentze is already a well-known poetry film. He was awarded several times and was even nominated for the German Film Award in 2009. It is based on a text by the Swiss slam poet Gabriel Vetter.
title: Der Conny ihr Pony
